exceptions.tactic: rewrite (getStP_K cn _ C' pf) in Heq; last by apply Hin.
rewrite (getStP_K cn _ C pf) in Heq; last by apply Hin.

original: intros. unfold getStP. intros Hin Heq. rewrite (getStP_K cn _ C' pf) in Heq; last by apply Hin. rewrite (getStP_K cn _ C pf) in Heq; last by apply Hin. rewrite <- Heq. reflexivity.
